attributes.additional_details:
It is often spouted about today that teenagers are unruly and wander the streets, a solution to this would be to give more jobs to teenagers under 14 because it would give them something to do and teach valuable life skills!

Support teenagers when looking for jobs, don't discourage them. There is an entire workforce across the country just waiting to be used so encourage teenagers to get jobs and make it easier to get one. Employment needn't be so difficult!
